TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TransactedCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
type TransactedCallback = delegate of unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Represents the callback method being run under transaction support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This delegate is passed to the <xref:System.Web.Util.Transactions.InvokeTransacted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and provides the callback method that is being run under transaction support.
